content: This is a **list of [buildings](/wiki/Building) and [structures](/wiki/Structures) in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore)**. See respective sections for more detailed lists. ## Singapore from end to end - [Tiger Sky Tower](/wiki/Tiger_Sky_Tower) ## Arts venues - [Esplanade - Theatres on the Bay](/wiki/Esplanade_-_Theatres_on_the_Bay) - [Parliament House, Singapore](/wiki/Parliament_House,_Singapore) ## Bridges - [List of bridges in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_bridges_in_Singapore) ## Convention centres - [Changi Exhibition Centre](/wiki/Changi_Exhibition_Centre) - [Singapore Expo](/wiki/Singapore_Expo) - [Suntec Singapore International Convention and Exhibition Centre](/wiki/Suntec_Singapore_International_Convention_and_Exhibition_Centre) ## Government buildings - [City Hall, Singapore](/wiki/City_Hall,_Singapore) - [Istana](/wiki/Istana_Singapore) (as *Government House* from 1867 to 1959) - [Police Cantonment Complex](/wiki/Police_Cantonment_Complex) - [Sri Temasek](/wiki/Sri_Temasek) ### Former government buildings - [Victoria Theatre and Concert Hall](/wiki/Victoria_Theatre_and_Concert_Hall) - [Old Supreme Court Building, Singapore](/wiki/Old_Supreme_Court_Building,_Singapore) ## Health specialist centres - [List of hospitals in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_hospitals_in_Singapore) ## Hotels - [List of hotels in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_hotels_in_Singapore) - [Parkroyal on Pickering](/wiki/Parkroyal_on_Pickering) - [Raffles Hotel](/wiki/Raffles_Hotel) - [Raffles The Plaza](/wiki/Raffles_The_Plaza) - [Swiss√¥tel The Stamford](/wiki/Swiss%C3%B4tel_The_Stamford) - [Gallery Hotel](/wiki/Gallery_Hotel) ## Libraries - [List of libraries in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_libraries_in_Singapore) - [National Library, Singapore](/wiki/National_Library,_Singapore) ## Military - [Fort Canning](/wiki/Fort_Canning) ## Museums and memorials - [List of memorials in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_memorials_in_Singapore) - [List of museums in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_museums_in_Singapore) - [Asian Civilisations Museum](/wiki/Asian_Civilisations_Museum) - [Raffles Museum of Biodiversity Research](/wiki/Raffles_Museum_of_Biodiversity_Research) - [Singapore Science Centre](/wiki/Singapore_Science_Centre) - [Sun Yat Sen Nanyang Memorial Hall](/wiki/Sun_Yat_Sen_Nanyang_Memorial_Hall) ## Prisons - [Changi Prison](/wiki/Changi_Prison) ## Railway stations - [List of Singapore MRT stations](/wiki/List_of_Singapore_MRT_stations) - [List of Singapore LRT stations](/wiki/List_of_Singapore_LRT_stations) - [Tanjong Pagar railway station](/wiki/Tanjong_Pagar_railway_station) ## Religious sites ### Buddhist temples - [Burmese Buddhist Temple](/wiki/Burmese_Buddhist_Temple) - [Foo Hai Ch'an Monastery](/wiki/Foo_Hai_Ch%27an_Monastery) - [Hai Inn Temple](/wiki/Hai_Inn_Temple) - [Kong Meng San Phor Kark See Monastery](/wiki/Kong_Meng_San_Phor_Kark_See_Monastery) - [Lian Shan Shuang Lin Monastery](/wiki/Lian_Shan_Shuang_Lin_Monastery) - [Palelai Buddhist Temple](/wiki/Palelai_Buddhist_Temple) - [Poh Ern Shih Temple](/wiki/Poh_Ern_Shih_Temple) - [Sakya Muni Buddha Gaya Temple](/wiki/Sakya_Muni_Buddha_Gaya_Temple) - [Singapore Buddhist Lodge](/wiki/Singapore_Buddhist_Lodge) - [Sri Lankaramaya Buddhist Temple](/wiki/Sri_Lankaramaya_Buddhist_Temple) - [Wat Ananda Metyarama Thai Buddhist Temple](/wiki/Wat_Ananda_Metyarama_Thai_Buddhist_Temple) ### Chinese religious pilgrimage site - [Kusu Island](/wiki/Kusu_Island) ### Chinese temples - [Ang Chee Sia Ong Temple](/wiki/Ang_Chee_Sia_Ong_Temple) - [Chan Chor Min Tong](/wiki/Chan_Chor_Min_Tong) - [Fo Shan Ting Da Bo Gong Temple](/wiki/Fo_Shan_Ting_Da_Bo_Gong_Temple) (Pulau Ubin) - [German Girl Shrine](/wiki/German_Girl_Shrine) (Pulau Ubin) - [Hong San See](/wiki/Hong_San_See) - [Jin Long Si Temple](/wiki/Jin_Long_Si_Temple) - [Kwan Im Thong Hood Cho Temple](/wiki/Kwan_Im_Thong_Hood_Cho_Temple) - [Tan Si Chong Su](/wiki/Tan_Si_Chong_Su) - [Thian Hock Keng](/wiki/Thian_Hock_Keng) - [Tou Mu Kung Temple](/wiki/Tou_Mu_Kung_Temple) - [Yueh Hai Ching Temple](/wiki/Yueh_Hai_Ching_Temple) ### Churches - [List of Roman Catholic churches in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_Roman_Catholic_churches_in_Singapore) - [Saint Andrew's Cathedral, Singapore](/wiki/Saint_Andrew%27s_Cathedral,_Singapore) - [Kampong Kapor Methodist Church](/wiki/Kampong_Kapor_Methodist_Church) - [Orchard Road Presbyterian Church](/wiki/Orchard_Road_Presbyterian_Church) - [Prinsep Street Presbyterian Church](/wiki/Prinsep_Street_Presbyterian_Church) - [Telok Ayer Chinese Methodist Church](/wiki/Telok_Ayer_Chinese_Methodist_Church) - [Wesley Methodist Church, Singapore](/wiki/Wesley_Methodist_Church,_Singapore) ### Indian temples - [Sri Mariamman Temple](/wiki/Sri_Mariamman_Temple,_Singapore) ### Mosques - [List of mosques in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_mosques_in_Singapore) - [Masjid Al-Istiqamah](/wiki/Masjid_Al-Istiqamah) - [Masjid Hajjah Fatimah](/wiki/Masjid_Hajjah_Fatimah) - [Masjid Jamae](/wiki/Masjid_Jamae) - [Masjid Sultan](/wiki/Masjid_Sultan) ## Schools - [List of schools in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_schools_in_Singapore) ## Stadiums - [List of stadiums in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_stadiums_in_Singapore) - [National Stadium, Singapore](/wiki/National_Stadium,_Singapore) ## Other structures - [124 and 126 St. Patrick's Road](/wiki/124_and_126/126A_St._Patrick%27s_Road) - [Merlion](/wiki/Merlion) - [Pearl Bank Apartments](/wiki/Pearl_Bank_Apartments) - [Singapore Flyer](/wiki/Singapore_Flyer) - [Black and white bungalow](/wiki/Black_and_white_bungalow) - [National Monuments of Singapore](/wiki/National_Monuments_of_Singapore) - [Shophouse](/wiki/Shophouse) - [List of tallest buildings in Singapore](/wiki/List_of_tallest_buildings_in_Singapore) - [List of buildings](/wiki/List_of_buildings)
title: List of buildings and structures in Singapore
